kirthi mendisriwira puwathpathe pa්radhana karthruwarayata paharadima pilibandawa parikshana pawathwima sandaha pathkara athi wishesha polis kandayamata me wanawita wadagath thorathuru rasak labi athi bawath ema thorathuru osse wimarshana kerigena yana bawath polispathi jayantha wika්ramarathna mahatha ‘silumina’ta kiya.labi athi hoduwawan pilibanda kisiwak pawasiya nohaki bawa ki polispathiwaraya eewa helikirimen wimarshanawalata badhawana bawada pawasuweya.wimarshana katayuthu thawath sarthaka karaganima sandaha mahajanathawagen thawath thorathuru balaporoththu wana bawada ee mahatha sandahan keleya.me wimarshanaya pilibanda janadhipathithuma da dadi awadhanayen sitina bawa ki polispathiwaraya haki ikmanin ema pa්raharaya pitupasa sitina pudgalayan kawdayi helikara ganima parikshanawala pa්radhana aramuna bawada kiweya.

shri lankawe pradhana pakasha deka ekwi sammuthiwadi aanduwak pawathwagena yama athamunta iwasiya nohakiwi athi bawath, eheyin mema aanduwa khedi wenwimata aasanna bawa pawasamin asathya prachara sidukaramin pawathina bawath, ema thorathuruwala sathya asathyathawa elambaena sapthambar masayedi siyallantama danagatha haki wana bawath widesha rakiya amathya thalatha athukorala mahathmiya prakasha kalaya.

(aa).kisiyam wishesha karyak kirimata pamanak kirimata atorni balapathrayak sakaskirimata awashya nam eki wishesha karyata pamanak atorni balaya sima kirimen pasukalinawa athiwiyahaki anawashya gatalu walin midimata haka.udaharanayak washayen haman widesha gathawa sitina kalasimawathula lankawe adhikaranayaka siwil nadu katayuththakata thama wenuwan peni sitimata nam eki karanayata pamanak atorni balapathraya sima karanna.
